content.value:
They really need to do more research on ADHD + Caffeine. Caveat being I'm undiagnosed.

Yesterday I had 3 coffees before 3pm and was tired the whole day before and after.

I just woke up after a nap that I took halfway through a cup of coffee.

Caffeine has never affected me.
content.html: They really need to do more research on ADHD + Caffeine. Caveat being I'm undiagnosed. Yesterday I had 3 coffees before 3pm and was tired the whole day before and after. I just woke up after a nap that I took halfway through a cup of coffee. Caffeine has never affected me.
